page.title: 03GUIDES
page.content: {GUIDES (cont.) They organise various events and activities throughout the year to raise money for tents and the church hall use etc..The Guides meet on Tuesday evenings at 7.30p.m. till 9p.m.Every summer some of the guides go to camp.Last year they camped near Wark and this year they are camping near Haltwhistle. Last year the guides raised lots of money to buy new tents to go camping with.This year is the 75th anniversary for guiding.Many events are being held to celebrate the feat.Some of the celebrations held are a vist to Blyth where all the guides from the North-East will meet there and in September a fair at Harrogate for all the guides from the North of England.
